quotes.text: Believe in yourself and all that you are.
quotes.author: Christian D. Larson

quotes.text: Every moment is a fresh beginning.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.text: I'm writing a book. I've got the page numbers done.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.text: A clear conscience is a sure sign of a bad memory.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: The purpose of life is not to be happy. It is to be useful.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.text: Why do programmers prefer dark mode? Light attracts bugs.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Life is like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get.
quotes.author: Forrest Gump
